transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Are Sumit bhaiya?

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Abhi Sumit ji line pe hai bhaiya.
Customer: Kon?
Executive: Head office se mere sir line pe hai.
Customer: Achha thik hai. Hello.
Executive: Hello, ha ji. ye sir kya keh rahe hai ki main ye bol raha hu.
Customer: Haan boliye. Rajan sir.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Aap bilkul same kar do mere dono catalog. Jaisa Muradabad wala hai na same Udaipur bhi same.
Customer: Kya?
Customer: Kya bol rahe hai samajh nahi pa raha hu main. Kya keh rahe hai?
Customer: Main ye bol raha hu ki mera jaisa catalog usme bana hua hai na.
Customer: Jo aapka star supplier me chal raha hai na.
Customer: Haan star supplier me chal raha hai. catalog waha bana do. Udaipur.
Executive: Sir bilkul aapko main pura pura catalog same bana diya hai. Sir aap ek baar cross check karke verify kar lijiye aur bhi correction hai to mujhe bata dijiye. Maine aapki taraf se wo pura kar diya hai.
Customer: Main abhi check kar leta hu aap line pe raho. Haan. Are bhaiya jo bhi fix kiya hai wo maine khud apne hatho se kiya hai. 100% mere kaaj hua hai.
Executive: Sir aap puchiye aap product dala aapne koi delete kar diya fir humne dala fir aapne delete kar diya. Aap aap boliye na sir aap bataiye main baith ke raat bhar main kar dunga do din karunga aap aap bataiye kya aur usme karni hai.
Customer: Aap sir unnecessary ki chizo ko sir wo kar rahe hai ki main profile ko wo nahi karunga main review rating mujhe chahiye ban to wo aisa nahi hota sir is tarah me to hume sir majburi me profile aapki close karni padegi kyuki hum do hi reason ho sakte hai customer satisfy hai ya nahi hai. Suno meri baat suno aapka name kya hai?
Executive: Mera naam Prabhat hua sir. Senior manager hu main.
Customer: Kya hai?
Executive: Prabhat Ranjan.
Customer: Prabhat Ranjan Prabhat aap meri baat suniye. Bolie.
Customer: Mere ek catalog me 300 product hai dusre me 140 product hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Wo same kaise ho sakte hai?
Executive: Sir kuch to product multiple naam se dale hue hai na sir wo waha par. To aap dalo na main abhi to wahi bol raha hu aap same karo bilkul same chahiye mujhe.
Executive: Sir same bilkul same to same jo product waha hai wahi same multiple naam hai to multiple naam bhi dal do ye keh rahe hai aap duplicacy bhi. Haan bilkul. Kyuki duplicacy se customer ha koi duplicacy aap dal bolne se duplicacy bhi dal dijiye kyuki mera ye tha ki same same product aapke dal gaye but waha par multiple multiple naam se dale hai sir.
Customer: Wo isiliye dale hue hai kyuki wo us us model number se unko jana jata hai.
Executive: Achha thik hai.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi sir main wo wo dalwa deta hu. Thik hai. Haan thik hai wo koi dikkat nahi hai wo ek aapka hai 150 product aur dalne hai. Main bilkul sir usko dhire dhire karke dalwa deta hu.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Kitne time me aap karke de doge mujhe ye kaam?
Executive: Ah sir at least sir dekho ek din me to nahi hone ka. Kam se kam ek do din ka mujhe time chahiye hoga sir add karne ka itna sara product.
Customer: Aap ek kaam karo aap mere ko wednesday ko call karenge hum wednesday tak karenge. Haan.
Executive: Thik hai. Chaliye thik hai sir.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai isko done karte hai uske baad fir aur koi concern hoga to bataiyega. Kyuki sir dekhiye baar baar sir wo chize unnecessary ka ticket pending hai ticket main band nahi kar raha hu abhi but ticket add kar bata dijiye band karunga jab aapka product add karunga. Lekin sir unnecessary ke jo review rating wale chize hai ki review review rating wala hi chiz bhi thik karo to wo chiz nahi ho payegi aap product wala aap bol rahe hai wo jo mere hath me wo. Aisa mat karo aap product karwa ke de do.
Executive: Haan okay sir main wo kara deta hu dusra profile wo Pandey ko bol ke thik hai sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants both catalogs to be exactly the same.

- Wants to know how long it will take.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to add the remaining products.

- Executive asked to call on Wednesday.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, products, same
